general.gigTitle: fix, develop, design, and customize your wordpress website

sellerCard.oneLiner: Designing and coding dreams into reality
sellerCard.description:
Hello, my name is Kamlesh, I am a senior Web and WordPress Developer with 8+ years of solid experience in developing dynamic websites. Completed 800 Projects of 55 country's 600 client's at various marketplaces since 2015. 100% client satisfaction is my first priority Expertise.  ☛Create a Mesmerized Dynamic Website ☛Fix Any Type of WordPress Bug ☛WordPress SEO & speed increase ☛Plugin/Theme Customization ☛Plugin/Theme Development

Having helped develop a series of commercially successful websites, I am seeking a new opportunity that will allow me to further expand on these skills.

description.content:
I will do web development and customization in Wordpress, WooCommerce, BuddyPress. Included with high-level coding standard speed optimization, custom development according to requirement. 


My main skills are

- Wordpress, WooCommerce, BuddyPress

- PHP, HTML, Javascript, CSS, MySQL

- PSD to HTML, Logo Design, PSD Design

- Plugin development and customization

- ECommerce and more


We know all the aspects of development, customization, fixing issues as well as ongoing maintenance, and also creative in UI/UX Graphic design with tools like Photoshop, and Illustrator. So we are much willing to do this job and make your job successful with an EXCELLENT output.


Please send a message before you send us an offer.


Note: Gig prices are starting prices. The final price will be determined based on requirements.

openGraph.title: fix, develop, design, and customize your wordpress website

reviews.comment: Kamlesh exceeded our expectations as a website builder. His technical expertise, clear communication, and attention to detail resulted in a beautiful and user-friendly website. He was professional, responsive, and delivered on time. Highly recommend his services!

seller_response.comment: Thank you so much for your kind words and trust in my work! I’m thrilled to know that you’re happy with the website and the experience. It was a pleasure collaborating with you, and I’m always here if you need any further assistance. Wishing you all the best!

reviews.comment: I've worked with Kamlesh multiple times now, and he is always able to get the job done!  You can trust him to handle any WordPress issues that your website is facing.

seller_response.comment:
Thank you so much for your kind words and trust! It's always a pleasure working with you, and I’m glad I could assist with your WordPress needs. I’m here anytime you need help or have new projects in mind.

Looking forward to our continued collaboration!

reviews.comment: Wie immer super Arbeit. Kann ihn nur jedem weiterempfehlen.
Tolle Arbeit. Gerne wieder und ich kann ihn nur Empfehlen.

seller_response.comment: Vielen Dank für das positive Feedback! Es war mir eine Freude, mit Ihnen zusammenzuarbeiten. Ich freue mich auf zukünftige Projekte und stehe jederzeit zur Verfügung.
Thank you so much! I'm glad you're satisfied with the work. Let me know if there's anything else you'd like to address or adjust.
